topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5419126d636872606fdb0000#post_5419126d636872606fdb0000
Here's something shocking that people don't want to talk about; men are actually abused and raped more than women.

Why don't you ever hear about male spousal abuse?  Cause men are talk to suck it up.  I don't care what anybody says; if someone goes around hitting their spouse with a chair and bashing their face into the kitchen sink that's abuse; just cause your spouse has their reproductive organs on the outside doesn't mean it's not abuse.

Why do men get raped more?  Easy; lots of prison rape.  If you're ever in prison for the love of god don't drop the soap.

topics.body:
"For if you ever hear anyone saying 'the usa is going downhill' or other crap":http://www.bjs.gov/content/pub/pdf/cv12.pdf
It covers pretty much everything.

Biggest thing about it though; homicide rates since 1993 are 48% down.  Theft accounts for majority of crime increase.
